task.summary: Gradle : Add The Dependencies Git : Add gitignore file
ResponseModel : Data Class created for remote response. Git : update gitignore file
Extension : Check Internet Connectivity Git : update gitignore file

Gradle : Added DI (Koin) DI : create Module (NetworkModule, ViewmodelModule, ApiModule) ApiService : Create SearchApi service Application : Create Application Class with DI apply Refactor : Response Class location and UI main class
DI : add RepositoryModule Comment : add comment
Base : create BaseRepository, BindingActivity, BindingViewHolder layout : start working on item layout. CodeCleanUp

Layout :-> 1. create SimmerLayout loader. 2. swipeRefreshView added. 3. databinding apply. 4. resource define in associate file (string.xml, dimens.xml, integers.xml).
Implementation :-> 1. loader implementation with simmerLayout. 2. repository pattern implemented with viewModel. 3. Koin Dependency apply.
Refactor :-> 1. change packageName.
CodeCleanUp :-> 1. improvements and clean the code.

Toolbar with Menu :-> 1. create menu and define toolbar.
Sort Data :-> 1. implement sorting by start and by name.
CodeCleanUp :-> 1. improvements.
